short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) / Canadian Armed Forces (CAF), Classified Security Management Infrastructure (CSMI) Project requires professional services to assist with filling a critical gap in the Department of National Defence (DND) work capacity. Specifically, there is a need for a US Key Management Infrastructure (KMI) Subject Matter Expert (SME), who is also experienced with designing large complex computer systems that integrate several different technologies.
description: This procurement is for a Request for Proposal against a Supply Arrangement.",
full_summary:
======================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

### Description of Work

The Department of National Defence (DND)/Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) require professional services for the Classified Security Management Infrastructure (CSMI) Project to fill a critical capacity gap in their work. Specifically, a US Key Management Infrastructure (KMI) Subject Matter Expert (SME) is required, with experience in designing large and complex computer systems integrating multiple technologies.

### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number:** cb-509-80283466 (W8474-24-EDG08)
*   **Amendment Number:** 4 (as of December 19, 2023)
*   **Publication Date:** December 12, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** December 19, 2023, at 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** Nil
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** Nil
*   **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Category:** SRV
*   **Procurement Method:** Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif (Competitive - Selective Tendering)
*   **Selection Criteria:** Prix le plus bas Lowest Price)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Accord de libre-échange Canada-Pérou (ALECP), Accord sur les marchés publics de l'Organisation mondiale du commerce (AMP-OMC), Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili (ALECC)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Région de la capitale nationale (RCN) (National Capital Region)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)

### Contact Information

*   **Name:** Daniel Ray
*   **Email:** daniel.ray2@forces.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** (613) 878-2495

### Attachments

The tender notice and description documents were made available for download through the following URLs:

[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/27214/12-dec-w8474-24-edg08-ths-sa-npp--en\_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/27214/12-dec-w8474-24-edg08-ths-sa-npp--
